li.text: -- GAME RESTART IS NEEDED TO APPLY NEW SETTINGS --

li.label: Apply mod author's preset (reset settings first)
Split Doctor workType?
li.tooltip: If False, only Priority settings are applied.

li.defaultValue: Treat the sick, bring them food, cheer them up, and perform assigned surgeries. Doctors will care for both colonists and prisoners.

li.label: Enable this workType?
li.tooltip: If false, don't assign any WorkGiver to this workType.

li.defaultValue: Treat the sick, bring them food, cheer them up, and perform assigned surgeries. Doctors will care for both colonists and prisoners.

li.label: Always start active?
li.tooltip: Pawns will be assigned this job by default.

li.label: Enable this workType?
li.tooltip: If false, don't assign any WorkGiver to this workType.

li.defaultValue: Treat the sick, bring them food, cheer them up, and perform assigned surgeries. Doctors will care for both colonists and prisoners.
